item.title: [release]Blood Sword and Shield
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

[size=16pt]If you use it, leave a comment please.[/size]

[size=14pt]At first this was only a show off as i don’t like releasing things.
But then i decided not to be greedy and share what I have.[/size]
Credits to me

In-game wield (Its meant to be a 2H sword but you do what you want to it.)
only pic i have for shield

Models:
Preload: http://www.mediafire.com/?oegghdgttyn
Gzip:

Ints

if(i == 12090) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 36214; class8.anInt181 = 1740; class8.anInt190 = 444; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -8; class8.anInt165 = 36215; class8.anInt200 = 36215; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Blood Sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A gift from the blood prince.".getBytes(); } if(i == 12091) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 36212; class8.anInt181 = 1740; class8.anInt190 = 444; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -8; class8.anInt165 = 36213; class8.anInt200 = 36213; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Blood Shield"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A gift, is not really blood sadly.".getBytes(); }

And before people start crying for a wire frame… here it is

And ill throw in this pic too
